headline: XBP Global Presents Everest Group Report Validating Its AI driven Public‑Sector Automation Capabilities
summary: IRVING, Texas, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- XBP Global Holdings, Inc. (“XBP Global” or “the Company”) (NASDAQ: XBP), a workflow automation leader that leverages decades of industry experience, a global footprint, and agentic AI to rethink business process automation and digital transformation, announced key findings from a recently released report from Everest Group, supported by XBP Global.
